allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
docs(agent): update backend architecture and API documentation

Documented major backend changes from recent GitHub pull:

Authentication System Migration:
- Removed legacy Google OAuth flow (endpoints deprecated)
- Now exclusively uses Supabase JWT authentication with PKCE
- All API endpoints require Supabase-issued tokens only
- Added SUPABASE_JWT_SECRET requirement
- Profile creation/lookup now via email from token claims

Baby Generation API Updates:
- Changed match_id parameter from query string to request body
- Updated POST/GET /api/v1/baby to accept JSON body
- Maintained query params for /api/v1/me/babies endpoint

Documentation Updates:
- Updated project_architecture.md with authentication flow changes
- Updated environment variables section with new requirements
- Updated API endpoints list with correct signatures
- Updated database_schema.md with body parameter examples
- Updated README.md Recent Updates section with breaking changes

Breaking Changes Documented:
- OAuth endpoints no longer functional
- Existing OAuth JWT tokens must be regenerated via Supabase
- Baby API calls need parameter location change (query â†’ body)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat(matching): update baby generation API to match backend changes

Updated baby generation feature to align with backend API changes:

API Client Updates:
- Changed GET /api/v1/baby to send match_id in request body (unconventional but required by backend)
- POST /api/v1/baby already correctly uses body params
- Added baby list API endpoint (GET /api/v1/me/babies)
- Added types for baby list response (BabyListItem, GetBabyListInput)
- Added useBabyList hook with query options

TypeScript Type Updates:
- Updated BabyApi type to allow null values
- image_url can be null when no baby generated yet
- created_at can be null when no baby generated yet
- me/other images and schools can be null

Implementation Status:
- Baby generator component already fully implemented with animations
- Dialog correctly passes matchId from Zustand store
- All API endpoints ready for backend integration
- Build passes with no type errors

Breaking Changes:
- GET /api/v1/baby now expects JSON body instead of query params
- Follows backend API spec from docs/API-specs.MD

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
